document.full_text: liverpool and manchester city were eliminated from the europa league on thursday night, and giuseppe rossi scored his tournament-high eighth goal to help villarreal advance to the quarterfinals.
document.title: liverpool, man city eliminated from europa league
lines_and_colors: liverpool and manchester city were eliminated from the europa league on thursday night, and giuseppe rossi scored his tournament-high eighth goal to help villarreal advance to the quarterfinals.
